oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hope Hill CME Church: plaque
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hope Hill Christian Methodist Episcopal Church
Hope Hill CME Church, Sitka Road, Carroll Co., TN

Color photograph of a plaque in a white panel wall that reads "Hope HIll CME Methodist Church; M.T. Adams, Chairman; Edgar Rodgers, Treas; M. Caldwell, Sec.; W.M. Caldwell, Oct. 16, 1949; Pastor Rev. M.H. Hardin; Rising Sun 61 A.F. & A.M."

Hope Hill CME Church was built by a local Masonic Lodge in 1949. It is about 100 yards away from the Sitka Rosenwald School. At that time the denomination was known as the Colored Methodist Episcopal Church, which became the Christian Methodist Episcopal Church in 1954.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee; Church buildings -- Tennessee
